alert.note: Alert for Caldwell; Claiborne; Jackson; Lincoln; Ouachita; Union (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 10 at 9:26AM CDT until June 10 at 10:30AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Union County in south central Arkansas... Northern Caldwell Parish in north central Louisiana... Jackson Parish in north central Louisiana... Union Parish in north central Louisiana... Ouachita Parish in north central Louisiana... Eastern Claiborne Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Lincoln Parish in north central Louisiana... * Until 1030 AM CDT. * At 924 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Beekman to 11 miles northwest of Bastrop to near Farmerville to near Cooley to 7 miles southwest of Wesson, moving south at 40 mph. Downed trees were reported earlier with this line of storms. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Monroe, Ruston, Claiborne, West Monroe, Grambling, Junction City, Swartz, Brownsville-Bawcom, Brownsville-Bawcomville, Farmerville, Richwood, Bernice, Sterlington, Wesson, Cooley, Dubach, Choudrant, Simsboro, Marion and Chatham. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Caldwell; Claiborne; Jackson; Lincoln; Ouachita; Union
